articles.title: American teen, 2 cousins missing in Mexico found safe - ABC News
articles.description: Elizabeth Gonzalez's uncle is now facing charges in her disappearance.
articles.content:
A missing Utah teen and her two cousins have been found safe, nearly two weeks after they disappeared in Mexico, the FBI said in a statement to ABC News.

articles.title: ‘Motown is Joetown’: Biden’s campaign recovery tour rolls into Detroit - MLive.com
